NativeActivityContext Class

Definition

The execution context for a NativeActivity.

In this Article

public class NativeActivityContext : System.Activities.ActivityContext

Remarks

A NativeActivity is provided access to the advanced capabilities of the WF runtime via NativeActivityContext, which is passed as a parameter to the activityâ€™s Execute method.

Properties

DefaultBookmarkScope

Gets the bookmark scope associated with the root of the workflow.

public System.Activities.BookmarkScope DefaultBookmarkScope { get; }
Value
BookmarkScope

A unique GUID identifier.

IsCancellationRequested

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the currently executing NativeActivity instance is to be canceled.

public bool IsCancellationRequested { get; }
Value
Boolean

true if the currently executing NativeActivity instance is to be canceled; otherwise, false.

Properties

Gets an object that handles properties for execution of the current NativeActivityContext.

public System.Activities.ExecutionProperties Properties { get; }
Value
ExecutionProperties

An object that handles execution properties.

CreateBookmark()

Creates a point at which a NativeActivity can passively wait to be resumed.

public System.Activities.Bookmark CreateBookmark ();
Returns
Bookmark

A bookmark.

CreateBookmark(BookmarkCallback)

Creates the point at which a NativeActivity can passively wait to be resumed and schedules the specified method to execute when notification of the resume operation completes.

public System.Activities.Bookmark CreateBookmark (System.Activities.BookmarkCallback callback);
callback
BookmarkCallback

The method to be called when a notification signals resumption of the NativeActivity.

Returns
Bookmark

The callback method.

CreateBookmark(String)

Creates the point, with the specified name, at which a NativeActivity can passively wait to be resumed.

public System.Activities.Bookmark CreateBookmark (string name);
name
String

The name of the bookmark.

Returns
Bookmark

A bookmark that includes the name of the bookmark.

CreateBookmark(BookmarkCallback,BookmarkOptions)

Creates the point at which a NativeActivity can passively wait to be resumed, with the specified method to execute when notification of the resume operation completes and with the specified option that governs how the bookmark is used during the execution of the current NativeActivity.

public System.Activities.Bookmark CreateBookmark (System.Activities.BookmarkCallback callback, System.Activities.BookmarkOptions options);
callback
BookmarkCallback

The method to be called when a notification signals resumption of the NativeActivity.

options
BookmarkOptions

An enumerated setting that governs how the bookmark operates in relation to other threads during the execution of the current NativeActivity.

Returns
Bookmark

A bookmark that includes the callback method and the bookmark execution option.

Remarks

Bookmark options include BookmarkOptions, BookmarkOptions and BookmarkOptions.

Bookmark callbacks can operate without bookmark options but bookmark options must always be paired with a callback because the options do not apply in situations where there is no callback method.

CreateBookmark(String,BookmarkCallback)

Creates the point at which a NativeActivity can passively wait to be resumed, with the specified name and with the specified method to execute when notification of the resume operation completes.

public System.Activities.Bookmark CreateBookmark (string name, System.Activities.BookmarkCallback callback);

String

The name of the bookmark.

ScheduleAction(ActivityAction,CompletionCallback,FaultCallback)

Schedules for execution a specified ActivityAction that has no parameters, and that bookmarks the specified callback locations where the parent process resumes upon completion of the ActivityAction.

public System.Activities.ActivityInstance ScheduleAction (System.Activities.ActivityAction activityAction, System.Activities.CompletionCallback onCompleted = null, System.Activities.FaultCallback onFaulted = null);
activityAction
ActivityAction

An action that executes when a specific event occurs in the parent activity.

onCompleted
CompletionCallback

A bookmark that indicates where the parent activity execution resumes upon completion of the ActivityAction.

onFaulted
FaultCallback

A bookmark that indicates where the parent activity execution resumes if an error causes the termination of the ActivityAction.

Returns
ActivityInstance

A new instance of an activity action.
